src:
Truk LED dan Mobil DANA Keliling Jabodetabek Woro-woro #Puas11Rupiah
07 Nov 2019, 21:37 by Faidah Umu - detikInet


Foto: Faidah Umu Safuroh/detikcom

Jakarta - Setelah Sudirman-Thamrin dibuat membiru oleh Parade DANA 11.11 saat car free day hari Minggu (3/11/2019) kemarin, kini DANA menggelar konvoi mobil LED DANA 11.11. Konvoi ini dilakukan untuk mengingatkan kembali kepada masyarakat bahwa program #Puas11Rupiah DANA akan dimulai besok hingga 4 hari ke depan."Kalau yang konvoi ini sebagai acara simbolik, kami ingin mengingatkan lagi ke konsumen bahwa Pesta DANA 11.11 yang menghadirkan program #Puas11Rupiah akan dimulai besok, tanggal 8 hingga 11 November," ujar Senior Marketing Manager DANA, Lim Kusuma di Capital Place, Jakarta, Kamis (7/11/2019).Sebagai simbol, DANA melepas 5 truk LED dan 10 mobil berstiker DANA untuk melakukan konvoi. Selain 15 kendaraan roda empat yang melakukan konvoi keliling Jabodetabek pada hari ini, DANA juga melepas total 2.500 trukLED dan mobil berstiker DANA.Meski matahari tengah berada tepat di atas kepala, tapi para peserta konvoi nampak bersemangat menyambut Pesta DANA 11.11 yang akan dimulai besok. Truk LED dan mobil berstiker DANA pun memulai konvoi tepat pukul 13.30 WIB.


Truk LED dan mobil berstiker DANA mulai melakukan Konvoi DANA 11.11. Kendaraan-kendaraan tersebut disediakan oleh MING Promotion dan Ubiklan. (Foto: dok. Faidah Umu Sofuroh/detikcom) Foto: Faidah Umu Sofuroh

Hingga Oktober 2019, DANA sudah mendapatkan hampir 30 juta pengguna aplikasi DANA. Lim berharap program #Puas11Rupiah akan semakin meningkatkan serta merealisasikan gerakan transaksi nontunai di Indonesia."Terlebih dengan adanya dompet digital DANA, kami sendiri yakin customer bisa bertransaksi lebih mudah, lebih nyaman, dan lebih aman tentunya dengan adanya DANA Protection," ucapnya.Sebagai informasi, program #Puas11Rupiah merupakan program yang dibuat oleh DANA yang memungkinkan para customer untuk menikmati berbagai benefit melalui pembelian voucher senilai Rp11 di aplikasi dompet digital DANApada tanggal 8-11 November 2019.Jumlah maksimal voucher yang bisa dibeli adalah 3 voucher F&B dan 1 voucher digital untuk pembelian pulsa, produk game, pembayaran tagihan, atau pembelian tiket nonton TIX ID. Tak hanya itu, setelah membeli voucher, pengguna langsung memiliki kesempatan untuk mendapatkan puluhan hadiah menarik yang telah disiapkan DANA.Adapun hadiah yang bisa didapatkan dengan sistem undian ini antara lain Samsung Note 10+, iPhone 11, Emas 10 gram, GoPro HERO7, iPad Mini, Tiket DWP, AirPods, Nintendo Switch, JBL Flip, Galaxy Buds, dan Saldo DANA."Pada intinya, pengguna yang membeli voucher senilai Rp11 di aplikasi DANA akan mendapatkan benefit untuk menikmati program #Puas11Rupiah serta kesempatan untuk memenangkan gadget keren," pungkasnya. Simak Video "Harbolnas, Jabodetabek Paling Banyak Pengiriman Barang via Go-Jek"[Gambas:Video 20detik](ujm/fay)
text:
LED Trucks and FUND Cars all around Jabodetabek Woro-woro # Puas11R Rupiah
Nov 7 2019, 21:37 by Faidah Umu - detikInet


Photo: Faidah Umu Safuroh / detikcom

Jakarta - After Sudirman-Thamrin was made blue by the DANA 11.11 Parade during a car free day on Sunday (11/3/2019) yesterday, DANA is now holding a convoy of LED DANA 11.11 cars. This convoy was carried out to remind the public that the #Puas11Ruta DANA program will begin tomorrow for the next 4 days. "If the convoy is a symbolic event, we would like to remind consumers again that the 11.11 FUN Festivity program which will present the #Puas11Ruta program will start tomorrow, November 8 to 11, "said DANA Senior Marketing Manager, Lim Kusuma at Capital Place, Jakarta, Thursday (11/07/2019). As a symbol, DANA released 5 LED trucks and 10 DANA-branded cars to conduct a convoy. In addition to the 15 four-wheeled vehicles that made the convoy around Jabodetabek today, DANA also released a total of 2,500 LED trucks and DANA-branded cars. Even though the sun was directly overhead, the participants of the convoy seemed eager to welcome the 11.11 FUND Party which will begin tomorrow. The LED truck and the DANA-branded car started the convoy at exactly 13.30 WIB.


LED trucks and car-funded FUNDs start Convoying FUND 11.11. These vehicles are provided by MING Promotion and Ubvertis. (Photo: doc. Faidah Umu Sofuroh / detikcom) Photo: Faidah Umu Sofuroh

As of October 2019, DANA has gained nearly 30 million users of the DANA application. Lim hopes the # Puas11R Rupiah program will further enhance and realize non-cash transaction movements in Indonesia. "Especially with the digital DANA wallet, we believe that customers can make transactions easier, more convenient, and safer, of course, with DANA Protection," he said. , # Puas11R Rupiah program is a program created by DANA that allows customers to enjoy various benefits through the purchase of a voucher valued at Rp11 in the DANA digital wallet application on 8-11 November 2019. The maximum number of vouchers that can be purchased is 3 F&B vouchers and 1 digital voucher for credit purchases, game products, bill payments, or purchasing TIX ID watch tickets. Not only that, after buying vouchers, users immediately have the opportunity to get dozens of attractive prizes that have been prepared by FUNDS. As for prizes that can be obtained with this lottery system include Samsung Note 10+, iPhone 11, 10 gram Gold, GoPro HERO7, iPad Mini , DWP tickets, AirPods, Nintendo Switch, JBL Flip, Galaxy Buds, and FUNDS. "In essence, users who buy vouchers worth Rp11 in the DANA application will get benefits to enjoy the #Puas11Ruta program and the chance to win cool gadgets," he concluded. Check out the video "Harbolnas, Jabodetabek Shipping Most Goods via Go-Jek" [Gambas: Video 20 seconds] (ujm / fay)
